name: The search (itch) (dubu)
description: This a 2D horror game with 16-bit art style. The story are simple , basically a dad lost is daughter for about 1 year nowhere to be found. So he decided to go look for her , and end up in a creepy , mysterious house , he decided to take a look and search his daughter there. For the gameplay , its kinda like corpse party where you can only run from your enemy and search for clue to proceed to the next area. Also we'll be putting a lot of different ghost in this game , and will try our best to make this as horror as possible.
